channel.title: [Allstar] Allstar Beta Online | Anti Null With Vid Proof | Highscores & Mor
channel.description:
Hey guys,
It's me Rush n Skill and im hosting a server .
============== 100 % working anti null =============== [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q78BYzVrEGc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] ============== 100 % working anti null ===============
[URL=http://info.flagcounter.com/S0Pm][IMG]http://s05.flagcounter.com/count/S0Pm/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_2/maxflags_12/viewers_0/labels_1/pageviews_1/flags_1/[/img][/URL]
Features so far(coded by Rush n Skill): - Lottery draws every hour(if potsize is 300m or above) --> it looks like raffle FS - random money from mining, agility, thieving. - Gem stealing than cut it for cash. - custom train - custom home - chocolate bars in starter inv (heals 45 hp) - custom bosses.. - Rares(nice idea FS) - pirate title unlocks at 10k or more pirate kills(rares) - dupes are fixed & shops aswell so players cannot cheat in shops all around server. - real RS slayer - custom yell drop like: < rares drop > (playername) just received: -- 1 x (item) --. - Highscores - all skills working. - custom items drops that for example increases xp or coin farming at stalls - active community ( already 250+ accounts made & still counting) - FULL procted server [size=14pt]- Lastest update: BOMB CHEAT CLIENT PERM BLOCKED[/size]
&& lots more!
client downlaod: [url=http://up.ht/19mvQgA]uppit link[/url] !! NEW CLIENT !! client downlaod: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/l3i26yujgvdzllv/allstar_beta_online.zip]mediafire link[/url] !! NEW CLIENT !!
forum at:[url=http://w11.zetaboards.com/Allstar_Beta_317/index/]Allstar Full forum[/url]
View pictures of server:
home: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6xrtoo.png[/img]
train: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2rmazoz.png[/img]
c shield effect: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/k1yiit.png[/img]
dicing: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2vm9176.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24bok20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/343pwft.png[/img]
skeleton armour( boots slayer experience) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25tz1gp.png[/img]
Lottery (Costs 100m to enter) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/iejo61.jpg[/img]
view skills in action(random coin stealing): [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34fe1w7.png[/img]
& more pics will be added.
Rush n Skill

item.title: [Allstar] Allstar Beta Online | Anti Null With Vid Proof | Highscores & Mor
item.dc:creator: @montana247 montana247
item.description:
@montana247 wrote:

Thakillah Thanks! I hope you still enjoy it, might see you soon in-game aswell :).

Elrick:

Doesn’t it kind of break the laws of sense to make it so random amounts of GP are given for skilling? I would suggest having them give players something like a “rock” for mining, which can then be traded into an NPC such as the archeologist or Old Man in exchange for GP.

Elrick, Thanks for that suggestion it’s sounds like cool too add acctually (I might will add it, however I gotta test it first).

Read full topic

Hey guys,

Features so far(coded by Rush n Skill):

  • Lottery draws every hour(if potsize is 300m or above) --> it looks like raffle FS

  • Gem stealing than cut it for cash.
